item.title: How To Ask Questions The Smart Way
item.description: In the world of hackers, the kind of answers you get to your technical questions depends as much on the way you ask the questions as on the difficulty of developing the answer. This guide will teach you how to ask questions in a way more likely to get you â€¦
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
